title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 111.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 111.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part apply to all properties under
the jurisdiction of the Department of Environmental Conservation designated as

Fish Hatcheries. The facilities to which this Part applies are: Hatchery
